MANAGEMENT, HR abbreviation for Vice President: someone in charge of one of the main parts of an organization: He's now the executive VP of the company.VP of human resources/marketing/sales She spent 16 years as a VP of marketing.
GOVERNMENT, POLITICS abbreviation for Vice President: the politician directly below the President of the US: The VP is the President of the US Senate.
